content: Gutbloom, you would not like my neighbor, “Bubba the Pigeon Man”. About 5 years ago he and his wife bought the land adjoining mine and built a house. Then they built another house, but smaller, then they built another house and another… I couldn’t figure out if they were breaking ground on a commune or…? Turns out he raises and races pedigreed racing pigeons! Gotta love Arkansas!
